plot: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddying for him.
title: Cad and Caddy
plot_es: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddying for him.
plot_en: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddying for him.
